website_summaries.verdict: This beautiful wooden table seats 6 people comfortably and is a gorgeous, high-quality choice for your home.
pros: Looks very expensive and has a stylish honey-colored finish
Measures 58.5 inches by 35.5 inches by 30 inches
cons: The color is darker in real life than shown in the photo

website_summaries.verdict: A more traditional dining table with similar lines and angles as more modern options. Fits well with a variety of décor styles.
pros: Features a high-quality finish and protective coat that protects the table from spills and messes
Plenty of space around the table for large groups

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Table
customer_reviews.text: This table completely surpassed my expectations! Amazing quality. This piece is super heavy, so I feel really good about the sturdiness - I will try to update my review to see how it holds up long term. An amazing table for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table! Quality is excellent, price is even better! Very easy to assemble and came in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble/disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I use this for an office desk. So much surface area! Other reviewers are correct about the color. It's more of a light espresso--much darker than the pictures--but I knew that when buying. Easy to assemble/disassemble. Shipping is risky. There is little protection from angry delivery drivers. Mine happened to arrive unscathed even though the cardboard was punctured. They should cover the surface and edges in a thin plastic or plywood.
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: It works for us and we like it. My one annoyance is that the package of hardware was broken open so the nuts were loose in the box, 2 of the 8 we never found so we had to use some spare ones from my husband's tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is such better quality then I even hoped. The price is amazing for what you get. Assembly is a piece of cake, its ridiculously easy. I love this. My hubby is impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kylea shortell

customer_reviews.title: nice item to have
customer_reviews.text: nice item to have .... large and flat..... easy to put together... took no longer than 10-20 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how nice this table is for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how nice this table is for the price. Very heavy and sturdy, easy to put together. Would have payed twice or three times as much happily
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Above average desk.
customer_reviews.text: Realized it was damaged on the edge after putting it together... Considering the almost excessive packaging not sure how that happened. For the assembly easy with detailed instructions could have had easier time with longer wrench. The floor padding is horrible quality and I only got 3/4 so just replaced them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Wook Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy and nice looking. Only a small gash on the edge that left the stain in tact, so no need to repair.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It fits perfectly in my kitchen, was easy to assemble, and was an awesome value!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strizak

customer_reviews.title: a great simple, spacious, solid table
customer_reviews.text: simple, solid, and sturdy table. takes like 5 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and sturdy table. A real asset to our dinning room!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good!
customer_reviews.text: Table was well packaged, no battle scars and was easy to put together. It suited our needs beautifully and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality, arrived on time and was a breeze ...
customer_reviews.text: Meets all expectations, good quality, arrived on time and was a breeze to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid table. Darker in color than picture shows; a slight knick in table top upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Christiania Cobean

customer_reviews.title: ... a work desk in my office and I really love it. It's large
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a work desk in my office and I really love it. It's large, solid, and looks good. Most "office desks" are pathetically small but this one is at a good height and has plenty of surface area.
customer_reviews.author: Artur Sapek

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfect for my small dining room
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color very sturdy will seat six easily .
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH OTOOLE

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged, but Customer Service was Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived damaged so I immediately contacted the company. Their response was swift and professional and a full refund was issued. Other than the damaged corner, the table was just what I wanted, great size and color and quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H.

product_meta.title: Better Homes and Gardens Bankston Brown Rectangle Honey Finish 6-Person Dining Table, 58.5L x 35.5W x 30H by Better Homes and Gardens
product_meta.description: Enrich any mealtime with this beautifully finished Better Homes and Gardens Bankston Wood Dining Table. The exquisite honey colored finish will blend well with a variety of existing furniture, flooring or rugs. This contemporary dining table includes easy-to-follow detailed instructions to ensure stress-free assembly and contains all the necessary hardware for completion. The dimensions of the tabletop are generous enough to seat up to six people comfortably. Matching chairs (sold separately) from the Bankston collection will complete the finished look for this honey colored Better Homes and Gardens dining table, or mix and match coordinating wood or upholstered chairs for a chic and vintage appearance. This furniture piece incorporates sturdy solid wood portions and veneer sections for a durable and long-lasting life. The Better Homes and Gardens Bankston Wood Dining Table is also available in additional finishes.
feature_bullets: Contemporary dining table is easy to assemble

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
